meanings.definition: In a selfless manner; without concern for oneself.
meanings.sent1: She helped her friend selflessly, putting their needs before her own.
meanings.sent2: He always works selflessly, never expecting anything in return.
meanings.sent3: The dog selflessly shared its bone with the cat, showing true generosity.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter selflessly rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.
meanings.sent5: The nurse selflessly stayed late to care for her patients, even though she was exhausted.

meanings.definition: Acting with a lack of selfishness or personal gain.
meanings.sent1: Her selflessly kind actions touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent2: The team appreciated his selflessly devoted attitude towards their success.
meanings.sent3: The selflessly generous donation surprised everyone at the charity event.
meanings.sent4: His selflessly humble nature made him a beloved figure in the community.
meanings.sent5: The selflessly thoughtful gift brought tears of gratitude to her eyes.
